text:
Sr. Systems Engineer|Seattle or Irvine,CA|Onsite|

CrowdStrike is looking to hire a Sr. Software Engineer in Data Services for the Seattle or Irvine area, to help us take our internal automation to the next level. We’re looking for a highly-technical, hands-on engineer. Who loves working with data plane services like Cassandra, ElasticSearch, Hadoop, and Spark, and is comfortable building self-service APIs and automation around large-scale cloud-based critical systems. We’ll be looking at candidate CVs with an eye on achievement. What you’ve accomplished in the past tells us the most about what you can do for us in the future.

Apply: https://app.jobvite.com/j?cj=opBT3fwG&s=Hacker_News
